name: Winter Espresso Blend | Dark Roast Coffee | NEW HARVEST !
description:
A robust blend for those crisp winter mornings!

Meet our Winter Espresso Blend, a robust dark roast coffee made for espresso and milk coffee lovers! This is also the first time that we have made a blend of Robusta & Arabica coffee. Our Winter Espresso Blend brews a bold cup that pairs beautifully with milk. We recommend brewing it in an Espresso Machine, Moka Pot, Electric Brewer, or French Press.

Best with: Espresso, Moka Pot, Electric brewer 
Cupper's Notes: Almond Oil, Cocoa & Caramel

Note
- Our fresh coffee beans are roasted in Mumbai, daily.
- All our single origin Arabica coffees go through testing and quality checks at the farm and roast level to ensure quality and a delicious cup each time.

name: Olive And Roasted Garlic Sourdough Bread
description:
Shipping Only In Mumbai! 

In an effort to support local businesses, we've collaborated with La Folie to deliver their freshly baked breads across Mumbai.
A naturally leavened bread made with stone milled organic 'khaplai' whole wheat flour, natural starter and unrefined sea salt. The addition of black olives and roasted garlic adds a flavourful punch!

name: Gaggia Cadorna - Automatic Espresso Machine
description:
Home Espresso Machine - Automatic

- Build your home barista menu with 14 pre-programmed beverages including a ristretto, espresso, espresso lungo, coffee, americano, cappuccino, cappuccino XL, café au lait, café cortado, latte macchiato, latte macchiato XL, flat white, frothed milk, and hot water for tea, hot cocoa, or infusions.

-  An integrated milk carafe creates the perfect temperature and texture of milk foam to make a beautifully layered milk based beverage. It runs through an automatic rinse cycle to get rid of any residual milk so you won’t have to worry about a messy clean-up process.

- Create up to 4 user profiles on the Cadorna Plus and save your favourite drinks for everyday consistency. Intuitive User Interface|A full color TFT display allows you to scroll through 14 specialty beverages with backlit buttons and experiment with a number of customizable settings to build your favourite barista-style beverage.

- Hassle free 1 year warranty. Helpline number:  8860995297
Included components: Espresso Machine, Milk Carafe, Group Lubricant, Grinder Adjustment Key/Scoop, Water Filter, Water Hardness Test Strip

Product Specifications
Dimensions:  17.3 x 10.2 x 15 inches
Weight: 9.5 kgs
Please Note: All our coffee machines come with a 340g pack of our bestseller, Marvahulla coffee.

name: GAGGIA CLASSIC - SEMI-AUTOMATIC ESPRESSO COFFEE MACHINE
description:
Home Espresso Machine - Semi Automatic

The Gaggia Classic is one of the best entry-level semi-automatic espresso machines available. Pull your own cafe-style espressos and cappuccinos with ease.

Texture milk for a velvety microfoam perfect for latte art with the new commercial steam wand. Brew expert espresso with the commercial-style 58 mm portafilter and the included commercial single and double shot baskets. Or, get the most out of pre-ground or ESE pods with the pressurised basket. The updated design offers a modern look, with improved pump mounts for quieter brewing.

Please Note: All our coffee machines come with a 340g pack of our bestseller, Marvahulla coffee.

name: My Espressino - Home Espresso Coffee Machine
description:
﻿﻿Home Coffee Machine - Semi Automatic

Personal espresso coffee machine brews coffee by forcing pressurised hot water through a 'puck' of ground coffee and a filter in order to produce a thick, concentrated espresso with crema same as any professional espresso coffee machine.

Technical Features
- 220-240v, 50Hz, 1450W
- Multifunction for making coffee, steam and hot water
- Durable Stainless steel housing
- Italian ULKA pump with 15bar pressure
- With a barometer, can know the pressure of coffee
- 1.7L removable water reservoir
- Thermo-Block with stainless steel heating channel to prevent aluminium Oxidation and make the water healthier
- Stainless steel filter holder and S.S filter with 58mm diameter
- Steam nozzle for cappuccino or latte
- Removable drip tray for easy cleaning
- Plastic tamping tools included.

Please Note: All our coffee machines come with a 340g pack of our bestseller, Marvahulla coffee.
